results.title: Metformin: Is it a drug for all reasons and diseases?
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has also been studied for its anti-bacterial, -viral, -@<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ efficacy.

citations.NLM: Triggle CR, Mohammed I, Bshesh K, Marei I, Ye K, Ding H, MacDonald R, Hollenberg MD, Hill MA. Metformin: Is it a drug for all reasons and diseases? Metabolism. 2022 Aug;133():155223. PMID: 35640743
citations.BibTeX: @article{35640743, title={Metformin: Is it a drug for all reasons and diseases?}, author={Triggle CR and Mohammed I and Bshesh K and Marei I and Ye K and Ding H and MacDonald R and Hollenberg MD and Hill MA}, journal={Metabolism}, volume={133}, pages={155223}}

results.title: A novel pharmacological mechanism of anti-cancer drugs that induce pyroptosis
results.text_hl: Other pyroptosis-inducing drugs, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_artenimol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C039060 @@@dihydroartemisinin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Famotidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015738 @@@famotidine@@@, were used to control blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, treat @<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@, and regulate blood @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ levels and are effective @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ treatments.

citations.NLM: Guo H, Wang Z, Ma R, Chen X, Li H, Tang Y, Du G, Zhang Y, Yin D. A novel pharmacological mechanism of anti-cancer drugs that induce pyroptosis Inflammopharmacology. 2023 Apr;31(2):745-754. PMID: 36867378
citations.BibTeX: @article{36867378, title={A novel pharmacological mechanism of anti-cancer drugs that induce pyroptosis}, author={Guo H and Wang Z and Ma R and Chen X and Li H and Tang Y and Du G and Zhang Y and Yin D}, journal={Inflammopharmacology}, volume={31}, number={2}, pages={745-754}}

results.title: A Cytoplasmic Heme Sensor Illuminates the Impacts of Mitochondrial and Vacuolar Functions and Oxidative Stress on Heme-Iron Homeostasis in Cryptococcus neoformans
results.text_hl: Stress generated by oxidative conditions impacts the @CHEMICAL_Heme @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006418 @@@heme@@@ pool, as do the drugs @CHEMICAL_artemisinin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031327 @@@artemisinin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; these drugs have @CHEMICAL_Heme @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006418 @@@heme@@@-related activities and are in clinical use for @<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Bairwa G, Sánchez-León E, Do E, Jung WH, Kronstad JW. A Cytoplasmic Heme Sensor Illuminates the Impacts of Mitochondrial and Vacuolar Functions and Oxidative Stress on Heme-Iron Homeostasis in Cryptococcus neoformans mBio. 2020 Jul 28;11(4):. PMID: 32723917

results.title: Malaria and diabetes.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ as a prophylactic agent for @<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ prevention warrants evaluation.

results.title: Metformin Promotes the Protection of Mice Infected With Plasmodium yoelii Independently of gammadelta T Cell Expansion
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could enhance anti-@<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ immunity.

results.title: Undetectable high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in acute malaria.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was an avid gym goer but denied @DISEASE_Substance_Related_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D019966 @@@anabolic steroid abuse@@@, a fact supported by a transient primary @DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@testosterone deficiency@@@ at presentation (@CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@ 6.56 nmol/L, RR 8.6-29; follicle-stimulating hormone high at 9.2 mU/L, luteinising hormone high at 11.9 mU/L). He was treated for @<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ and started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Rakovac Tisdall A, Crowley VEF, Crook MA. Undetectable high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in acute malaria. J Clin Lipidol. 2018 May-Jun;12(3):822-825. PMID: 29609858
citations.BibTeX: @article{29609858, title={Undetectable high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in acute malaria.}, author={Rakovac Tisdall A and Crowley VEF and Crook MA}, journal={J Clin Lipidol}, volume={12}, number={3}, pages={822-825}}
